details.description: Contact Student Finance England, address and phone details and contact details for Student Finance Services European team
details.alternative_title: Contact information for Student Finance England
details.body:
Parents and partners need the student’s consent before Student Finance England can give them information - the student can give consent when they apply or at a later date.

Student Finance England

Telephone: 0845 300 50 90
Textphone: 0845 604 44 34
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Saturday and Sunday, 9am to 5:30pm

Student Finance England
PO Box 210
Darlington
DL1 9HJ

EU students

Student Finance Services European Team

Telephone: 0141 243 3570
From outside the UK: +44 (0)141 243 3570
Monday to Friday 9am to 5:30pm

Student Finance Services European Team
Student Finance England
PO Box 89
Darlington
DL1 9AZ

European Economic Area (EEA) Migrant Worker Applications
Student Finance England
PO Box 89
Darlington
DL1 9HJ

Sign up for or log in to your student finance account.

Student finance complaints

If you have a complaint contact the Student Loans Company.

Student Loans Company

customer_complaints@slc.co.uk
Telephone: 0845 073 8908

Download the ‘How to make a complaint’ (PDF, 146KB)

details.description: Including loans, bursaries, grants, student finance and paying back loans
Get help if you're at school, planning to go on to further or higher education, looking for training or interested in a student or career development loan.
Use this student finance calculator to estimate what student finance you could get for university - student loans, student grants, bursaries and other funding

related.title: Register or log in to student finance

details.description: Log in to your student finance account or sign up for a new one - see when your payments are due,  track your application, change your details and apply for new finance
